# docker_plugin (Data Source)

Reads information about a Docker plugin.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name or ID of the plugin.

### Read-Only

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the plugin is enabled.
- `env` (List of String) Environment variables for the plugin.
- `id` (String) The ID of this data source.
- `plugin_reference` (String) The plugin reference (image name).
